General.Name: World Known MFG (Cayman) Limited
General.Description: World Known MFG (Cayman) Limited manufactures and sells automobile and green energy parts in the United States and internationally. The company offers energy saving and carbon-reducing parts of commercial vehicle engine, ADB calipers, rear panels of brake pad, bend pipes and accessories of turbocharger, cases of flywheel, cases of swing arms, exhaust manifolds, braces, and core shaft; and parts of braking system for wind power generators and machinery equipment industries. It serves customers in commercial vehicle, green energy, construction machinery, agricultural machinery, and other industrial equipment industries. World Known MFG (Cayman) Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: The Grand Pavilion Commercial Centre, Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, KY1-1208
